name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: McLaren Cyberpunk Neon City Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rev up your browser with McLaren’s futuristic power!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rev up your browser with McLaren’s futuristic power! Download now for stunning live wallpapers and a high-speed cyberpunk new tab experience.

Transform your new tab into a cyberpunk racing world with the McLaren Cyberpunk Neon City Live Wallpaper extension! Featuring a high-speed McLaren in a neon-lit, futuristic city, this extension combines cutting-edge automotive design with vibrant cyberpunk aesthetics, bringing thrilling energy to your browser.

Key Features:
Dynamic McLaren Live Wallpaper: Enjoy high-quality animated backgrounds showcasing McLaren in a glowing, neon cityscape.
Clock & Date Display: Stay on schedule with an integrated clock and date layout that complements the high-tech theme.
Quick Access Links: Easily navigate to your favorite websites with one-click shortcuts.
Additional Options: Discover more extensions, view privacy policies, or uninstall with ease.
Perfect for car enthusiasts, McLaren fans, and lovers of cyberpunk art, this extension brings the thrill of futuristic racing to your browser.

Download now and let McLaren’s power drive your browsing experience!
